<small>Aramaic form: **<big>[[H7412|רְמָה]]</big>**</small>
 I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָמָה‎</span> **verb** ==cast, shoot== (Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***ramû***</u></abbr> ***throw, lay***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***throw, shoot***; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***strike, aim a blow at***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎רְמָא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***cast, throw***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ר‎</span>, subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> [[Exod.15.1|Exod 15:1]]; [[Exod.15.21|Exod 15:21]] (song), with accusative + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּיָּם‎</span>; ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹמֵה קֶשֶׁת‎</span> [[Jer.4.29|Jer 4:29]] collective (or read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹמֵי‎</span> ***bow-shooter, bowmen***, plural construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נוֺשְׁקֵי רוֺמֵיקֿ‎</span> [[Ps.78.9|Ps 78:9]] (see II.  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נשׁק‎</span>); compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹבֵה‎</span> [[Gen.21.20|Gen 21:20]] (see II.  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רבה‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קַשָּׁת‎</span> 



 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָמָה‎</span>] **verb Pi\`el** ==beguile, deal treacherously with== (Late Hebrew in derivatives; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רְמָא‎</span> Pa\`el; [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]]<sup>Lex</sup> compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> VI. ***be sluggish, backward*** (of wound), ***become putrid, corrupt***); — ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רִמָּה‎</span> [[Prov.26.19|Prov 26:19]], suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רִמָּנִי‎</span> [[2Sam.19.27|2Sam 19:27]] 2 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רִמִּיתָנִי‎</span> [[Gen.29.25|Gen 29:25]]; [[1Sam.28.12|1Sam 28:12]] 2 feminine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דִמִּיתִנִי‎</span> [[1Sam.19.17|1Sam 19:17]], etc.; ***Infinitive construct*** suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְרַמּוֺתַנִי‎</span> [[1Chr.12.18|1Chr 12:18]] ([[BDB#van d.H.|van d. H.]] v.[[1Chr.12.17|1Chr 12:17]]); — ***be-guile, deceive, mislead***, acc. person, [[Gen.29.25|Gen 29:25]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[Josh.9.22|Josh 9:22]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]), [[1Sam.28.12|1Sam 28:12]]; [[2Sam.19.27|2Sam 19:27]]; [[Prov.26.19|Prov 26:19]] ***deal treacherously with, betray***, accusative of person, [[1Sam.19.17|1Sam 19:17]]; [[Lam.1.19|Lam 1:19]], + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְצָרַי‎</span> [[1Chr.12.17|1Chr 12:17]].
